TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AuditLogTrimmingReportCallout extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.SharePoint.IAuditLogTrimmingCallout
Public NotInheritable Class AuditLogTrimmingReportCallout Implements IAuditLogTrimmingCallout

Docs.summary: Implements the IAuditLogTrimmingCallout interface to capture audit log reports before trimming the site's audit log and after the site's audit log is trimmed.

remarks.para: Reports will be captured in the configured library.

Docs.param: The site that is the storage location for the audit log reports that are generated by the periodic trimming job.
Whether to throw an exception if the folder doesn’t exist.
Docs.summary: Gets the storage location for audit log reports that are generated by the periodic trimming job.

Docs.param: The site for which the audit log is being trimmed.
Audit log data prior to this date will be trimmed.
Docs.summary: Called after the audit log for the specified site is trimmed, not implemented in object.

remarks.para: Not implemented in the AuditLogTrimmingReportCallout object.

Docs.param: The site for which the audit log is being trimmed.
Audit log data prior to this date will be trimmed.
Docs.summary: Generates an audit log report for the specified site for entries occured before the specified date.

remarks.para: Called before the audit log for the specified site is trimmed.
